user: What should I expect during my first PrEP consultation?
bot:
During your first PrEP consultation, you'll discuss your health history and any potential risks for HIV. The healthcare provider will likely ask about your lifestyle, sexual history, and any concerns you have. They may also perform tests, including an HIV test, kidney function test, and possibly other screenings.

This is also a great time to ask any questions you have about the medication, side effects, and ongoing care.
